dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8763 IH: Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board Inspector General Act of 2022
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform

form.official-title: To amend the Inspector General Act of 1978 to establish a Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board Inspector General, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board Inspector General Act of 2022.

section.header: Establishment of Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board Inspector General
section.text: Section 12 of the Inspector General Act of 1978 (5 U.S.C. App.) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by inserting the Executive Director of the Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board; before or the Director of the National; and
in paragraph (2), by inserting the Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board, before or the National.
